response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $10,000 to us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose a fair transaction price of $9,500 for this product. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset while also allowing me to maximize the return on our investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
